dialogue:
[header name:X Veteran]
There are [color value:blue]3 attributes,[color value:regular][pause value:.5] each one associated with a [color value:blue]different color.[color value:regular]

[newpage wait:2]
[header name:X Veteran]
[color value:cor]Corporis (COR)[color value:regular] is the attribute associated with strength and reflexes.

[newpage wait:2]
[header name:X Veteran]
[color value:arc]Arcana (ARC)[color value:regular] is the attribute associated with knowledge of the arcane.

[newpage wait:2]
[header name:X Veteran]
[color value:ani]Anima (ANI)[color value:regular] is the attribute associated with survival and instinct.

[newpage wait:2]
[header name:X Veteran]
Pay attention to what [color value:blue]color[color value:regular] your cards have. [pause value:.5][endl]
Improving the correspondent attribute is a sure way to make some cards stronger!
name: Veteran 3
